name: testing-and-debugging-ensuring-mern-app-reliability-puritized
description: This assignment focuses on implementing comprehensive testing strategies for a MERN stack application, including unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing, along with debugging techniques.

scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client start"
scripts.install-all: npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix client install
